lines.text: Before a bullet, all men are equal, like in the Constitution.
Of all noises, I think music is the least disagreable, don't you?

I came here fifteen years ago to be by myself. Haven't got a mirror in the place. Even my own reflection's too much company. Let me tell you something, you're either a fool, or you're bats. Does the word 'bats' means anything to you outside of baseball?
